conversation.text: I recommend 'The Blind Side'. It tells the inspiring story of Michael Oher, a young football player with a troubled background who becomes an All-American under the guidance of a caring woman and her family. You'll enjoy the performances by actors Adriane Lenox, Ray McKinnon, and Timothy McGraw.
